example.parse: (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ننصح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC اخوت) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الطلاب))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:SJ ينظروا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN مصلحة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البلاد)))

arg.g: To concider the interests of the country
